Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma scored 131 off 84 balls including 16 fours and 5 sixes
India chased down 272 with 15 overs to spare
K Ishan and Virat Kohli provided solid support
Jasprit Bumrah took 4 wickets for 14 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed pride in the team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: No significant weather or pitch conditions affecting the match
India maintained their strong showing in the World Cup
